text: The 2017 Humpty's Champions Cup is the final Grand Slam of curling event of the 2016–17 curling season. ==Men== ===Teams=== The teams are listed as follows: http://www.thegrandslamofcurling.com/curling/champions- cup/2017-humptys-champions-cup-mens-teams/ {| class=wikitable |- !
